repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes class material and memorabilia collected by Virginia Drury. This material includes cafeteria cards, class attendance cards, photographs, hygiene class attendance card, dance cards, playbills, and correspondence.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Virginia "Gin" Drury (1907-1991), a native of Winthrop, Massachusetts, graduated from Jackson College in 1930 with a degree in French. As a student, Drury was a member of the Alpha Omicron Pi women's fraternity and participated in many campus activities such as field hockey, French Club, and Sociology Club. On June 28, 1931, Drury married Richard Clark Shipman, '31 in a ceremony at Tufts College. The Shipmans lived in Lewistown, Montana, where they raised at least one son. Over the years Drury maintained her ties with Tufts making several donations to the college. Drury died in March 1991.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains materials related to campus activities of Virginia Drury while at Tufts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes dance cards, playbills, and correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes cafeteria cards, class attendance cards, photographs, hygiene class attendance card and Registration Department's 1925 student housing list

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes an invitation written on a paper cigarette, and a paper figure with a graduation cap and striped red/white shorts.
